mapper.select: select case when length(new_post_code) = 4 then '0'||new_post_code else new_post_code end zipcode, sido_kor sido, gugun_kor gugun, nvl(upmyon_kor, ' ') upmyon, doro_kor doro, case when building_refer_number != '0' then building_origin_number||'-'||building_refer_number else trim(to_char(building_origin_number, '99999')) end buildingNumber, sigugun_building_name sigugunBuildingName from postcode where doro_kor like '%'||#{doro}||'%' or sigugun_building_name like '%'||#{doro}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert all into member (id, name, pass, emailid, emaildomain, joindate) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{pass}, #{emailid}, #{emaildomain}, sysdate) into member_detail (id, zipcode, address, address_detail, tel1, tel2, tel3) values (#{id}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, #{tel1}, #{tel2}, #{tel3}) select * from dual
